entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:59 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tobermory 7:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow overnight. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
